SEARCH
Package seasofyore.core

Class Player

java.lang.Object
seasofyore.core.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIPlayer
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the Seas of Yore game, managing their fleet, civilization, and game quadrants.

  • Field Summary

    Field

    static final int

    The fixed size of the player's fleet.

      fQ - the player's friendly quadrant

      Parameters:

      y - the y-coordinate of the target cell
      Returns:

      public boolean hasLost()
      Checks if the player has lost the game.
      Returns:
